desc: This notification is sent when an account holder has been created.

content.desc: The details of the account holder creation.

accountCode.desc: The code of a new account created for the account holder.

accountHolderCode.desc: The code of the new account holder.

accountHolderDetails.desc: Details of the new account holder.

address.desc: The address of the account holder.

city.desc:
The name of the city.

Required if either houseNumberOrName, street, postalCode, or stateOrProvince are provided.

country.desc:
The two-character country code of the address. The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

If you don't know the country or are not collecting the country from the shopper, provide country as ZZ.

houseNumberOrName.desc: The number or name of the house.

postalCode.desc:
The postal code.

A maximum of five (5) digits for an address in the USA, or a maximum of ten (10) characters for an address in all other countries.
Required if either houseNumberOrName, street, city, or stateOrProvince are provided.

stateOrProvince.desc:
The abbreviation of the state or province.

Two (2) characters for an address in the USA or Canada, or a maximum of three (3) characters for an address in all other countries.
Required for an address in the USA or Canada if either houseNumberOrName, street, city, or postalCode are provided.

street.desc:
The name of the street.

The house number should not be included in this field; it should be separately provided via houseNumberOrName.
Required if either houseNumberOrName, city, postalCode, or stateOrProvince are provided.

bankAccountDetails.desc:
Each of the bank accounts associated with the account holder.

Each array entry should represent one bank account.
For comprehensive detail regarding the required BankAccountDetail fields, please refer to the KYC Verification documentation.

accountNumber.desc:
The bank account number (without separators).

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

accountType.desc:
The type of bank account.
Only applicable to bank accounts held in the USA.
The permitted values are: checking, savings.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

bankAccountName.desc: The name of the bank account.

bankAccountReference.desc: Merchant reference to the bank account.

bankAccountUUID.desc:
The unique identifier (UUID) of the Bank Account.

If, during an account holder create or update request, this field is left blank (but other fields provided), a new Bank Account will be created with a procedurally-generated UUID.


If, during an account holder create request, a UUID is provided, the creation of the Bank Account will fail while the creation of the account holder will continue.


If, during an account holder update request, a UUID that is not correlated with an existing Bank Account is provided, the update of the account holder will fail.


If, during an account holder update request, a UUID that is correlated with an existing Bank Account is provided, the existing Bank Account will be updated.

bankBicSwift.desc:
The bank identifier code.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

bankCity.desc:
The city in which the bank branch is located.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

bankCode.desc:
The bank code of the banking institution with which the bank account is registered.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

bankName.desc:
The name of the banking institution with which the bank account is held.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

branchCode.desc:
The branch code of the branch under which the bank account is registered. The value to be specified in this parameter depends on the country of the bank account:

United States - Routing number
United Kingdom - Sort code
Germany - Bankleitzahl


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

checkCode.desc:
The check code of the bank account.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

countryCode.desc:
The two-letter country code in which the bank account is registered.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

currencyCode.desc:
The currency in which the bank account deals.

The permitted currency codes are defined in ISO-4217 (e.g. 'EUR').


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

iban.desc:
The international bank account number.

The IBAN standard is defined in ISO-13616.


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerCity.desc:
The city of residence of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerCountryCode.desc:
The country code of the country of residence of the bank account owner.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerDateOfBirth.desc: The date of birth of the bank account owner.

ownerHouseNumberOrName.desc:
The house name or number of the residence of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerName.desc:
The name of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerNationality.desc:
The country code of the country of nationality of the bank account owner.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').


Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerPostalCode.desc:
The postal code of the residence of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerState.desc:
The state of residence of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

ownerStreet.desc:
The street name of the residence of the bank account owner.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

primaryAccount.desc: If set to true, the bank account is a primary account.

taxId.desc:
The tax ID number.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

urlForVerification.desc:
The URL to be used for bank account verification.
This may be generated on bank account creation.

Refer to the Onboarding and verification section for details on field requirements.

businessDetails.desc:
Details applicable to Business legal entities.
Populated only if the account holder's legal entity is of type Business.

Required when being used in a /createAccountHolder request in which the legal entity is Business.

doingBusinessAs.desc: The registered name of the company (if it differs from the legal name of the company).

legalBusinessName.desc: The legal name of the company.

registrationNumber.desc: The registration number of the company.

shareholders.desc:
Each of the shareholders associated with the company.
Each array entry should represent one shareholder.

city.desc:
The name of the city.

Required if either houseNumberOrName, street, postalCode, or stateOrProvince are provided.

country.desc:
The two-character country code of the address. The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

If you don't know the country or are not collecting the country from the shopper, provide country as ZZ.

houseNumberOrName.desc: The number or name of the house.

postalCode.desc:
The postal code.

A maximum of five (5) digits for an address in the USA, or a maximum of ten (10) characters for an address in all other countries.
Required if either houseNumberOrName, street, city, or stateOrProvince are provided.

stateOrProvince.desc:
The abbreviation of the state or province.

Two (2) characters for an address in the USA or Canada, or a maximum of three (3) characters for an address in all other countries.
Required for an address in the USA or Canada if either houseNumberOrName, street, city, or postalCode are provided.

street.desc:
The name of the street.

The house number should not be included in this field; it should be separately provided via houseNumberOrName.
Required if either houseNumberOrName, city, postalCode, or stateOrProvince are provided.

email.desc: The e-mail address of the contact.

fullPhoneNumber.desc:
The phone number of the contact provided as a single string.  It will be handled as a landline phone.
Examples: "0031 6 11 22 33 44", "+316/1122-3344", "(0031) 611223344"

gender.desc:
The gender.

The following values are permitted: MALE, FEMALE, UNKNOWN.

infix.desc:
The name's infix, if applicable.

A maximum length of twenty (20) characters is imposed.

dateOfBirth.desc:
The date of birth of the person.
The date should be in ISO-8601 format yyyy-mm-dd (e.g. 2000-01-31).

documentData.desc: Key value pairs of document type and identify numbers

expirationDate.desc:
The expiration date of the document.
The date should be in ISO-8601 format yyyy-mm-dd (e.g. 2000-01-31).

issuerCountry.desc:
The two-character country code of the issuer.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

issuerState.desc: The state issued the document (if applicable)

number.desc: The number of the document. Delete the given type if the value empty.

type.desc:
The type of the document. More then one item pert type does not allowed.
Valid values: ID, PASSPORT, VISA, DRIVINGLICENSE

nationality.desc:
The nationality of the person represented by a two-character country code.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

phoneNumber.desc: The phone number of the contact.

phoneCountryCode.desc:
The two-character country code of the phone number.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

phoneNumber.desc:
The phone number.

The inclusion of the phone number country code is not necessary.

phoneType.desc:
The type of the phone number.

The following values are permitted: Landline, Mobile, SIP, Fax.

shareholderCode.desc:
The unique identifier (UUID) of the Shareholder.

If, during an Account Holder create or update request, this field is left blank (but other fields provided), a new Shareholder will be created with a procedurally-generated UUID.


If, during an Account Holder create request, a UUID is provided, the creation of the Shareholder will fail while the creation of the Account Holder will continue.


If, during an Account Holder update request, a UUID that is not correlated with an existing Shareholder is provided, the update of the Shareholder will fail.


If, during an Account Holder update request, a UUID that is correlated with an existing Shareholder is provided, the existing Shareholder will be updated.

webAddress.desc: The URL of the website of the contact.

taxId.desc: The tax ID of the company.

email.desc: The email address of the account holder.

fullPhoneNumber.desc:
The phone number of the account holder provided as a single string. It will be handled as a landline phone.
Examples: "0031 6 11 22 33 44", "+316/1122-3344", "(0031) 611223344"

individualDetails.desc:
Details applicable to Individual legal entities.
Populated only if the account holder's legal entity is of type Individual.

Required when being used in a /createAccountHolder request in which the legal entity is Individual.

name.desc:
The name of the individual.

Make sure your account holder registers using the name shown on their Photo ID.

gender.desc:
The gender.

The following values are permitted: MALE, FEMALE, UNKNOWN.

infix.desc:
The name's infix, if applicable.

A maximum length of twenty (20) characters is imposed.

dateOfBirth.desc:
The date of birth of the person.
The date should be in ISO-8601 format yyyy-mm-dd (e.g. 2000-01-31).

documentData.desc: Key value pairs of document type and identify numbers

expirationDate.desc:
The expiration date of the document.
The date should be in ISO-8601 format yyyy-mm-dd (e.g. 2000-01-31).

issuerCountry.desc:
The two-character country code of the issuer.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

issuerState.desc: The state issued the document (if applicable)

number.desc: The number of the document. Delete the given type if the value empty.

type.desc:
The type of the document. More then one item pert type does not allowed.
Valid values: ID, PASSPORT, VISA, DRIVINGLICENSE

nationality.desc:
The nationality of the person represented by a two-character country code.

The permitted country codes are defined in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 (e.g. 'NL').

merchantCategoryCode.desc:
The Merchant Category Code of the account holder.

If not specified in the request, this will be derived from the platform account (which is configured by Adyen).

metadata.desc:
A set of key and value pairs for general use by the account holder or merchant.
The keys do not have specific names and may be used for storing miscellaneous data as desired.

The values being stored have a maximum length of eighty (80) characters and will be truncated if necessary.
Note that during an update of metadata, the omission of existing key-value pairs will result in the deletion of those key-value pairs.

payoutMethods.desc:
Each of the card tokens associated with the account holder.

Each array entry should represent one card token.
For comprehensive detail regarding the required CardToken fields, please refer to the KYC Verification documentation.

webAddress.desc: The URL of the website of the account holder.

accountHolderStatus.desc: The status of the new account holder.

events.desc: A list of events scheduled for the account holder.

event.desc:
The event.

Permitted values: InactivateAccount, RefundNotPaidOutTransfers.
For more information, refer to Verification checks.

executionDate.desc: The date on which the event will take place.

reason.desc: The reason why this event has been created.

payoutState.desc: The payout state of the account holder.

allowPayout.desc: Indicates whether payouts are allowed. This field is the overarching payout status, and is the aggregate of multiple conditions (e.g., KYC status, disabled flag, etc). If this field is false, no payouts will be permitted for any of the account holder's accounts. If this field is true, payouts will be permitted for any of the account holder's accounts.

disableReason.desc: The reason why payouts (to all of the account holder's accounts) have been disabled (by the platform). If the disabled field is true, this field can be used to explain why.

disabled.desc: Indicates whether payouts have been disabled (by the platform) for all of the account holder's accounts. A platform may enable and disable this field at their discretion. If this field is true, allowPayout will be false and no payouts will be permitted for any of the account holder's accounts. If this field is false, allowPayout may or may not be enabled, depending on other factors.

notAllowedReason.desc: The reason why payouts (to all of the account holder's accounts) have been disabled (by Adyen). If payouts have been disabled by Adyen, this field will explain why. If this field is blank, payouts have not been disabled by Adyen.

payoutLimit.desc: The maximum amount that payouts are limited to. Only applies if payouts are allowed but limited.

value.desc:
The payable amount that can be charged for the transaction.
The transaction amount needs to be represented in minor units according to the following table.

tierNumber.desc: The payout tier that the account holder occupies.

processingState.desc: The processing state of the account holder.

disableReason.desc: The reason why processing has been disabled.

disabled.desc: Indicates whether the processing of payments is allowed.

processedFrom.desc: The lower bound of the processing tier (i.e., an account holder must have processed at least this amount of money in order to be placed into this tier).

value.desc:
The payable amount that can be charged for the transaction.
The transaction amount needs to be represented in minor units according to the following table.

processedTo.desc: The upper bound of the processing tier (i.e., an account holder must have processed less than this amount of money in order to be placed into this tier).

value.desc:
The payable amount that can be charged for the transaction.
The transaction amount needs to be represented in minor units according to the following table.

tierNumber.desc: The processing tier that the account holder occupies.

status.desc:
The status of the account holder.

Permitted values: Active, Inactive, Suspended, Closed.

statusReason.desc: The reason why the status was assigned to the account holder.

description.desc: The description of the new account holder.

invalidFields.desc: A list of fields that caused the /createAccountHolder request to fail.

errorDescription.desc: A description of the validation error.

field.desc: The full name of the property.

shareholderCode.desc: The code of the shareholder that the field belongs to. If empty, the field belongs to an account holder.

legalEntity.desc: The type of legal entity of the new account holder.

primaryCurrency.desc: The three-character ISO currency code, with which the prospective account holder primarily deals.

pspReference.desc: The reference of a request.  Can be used to uniquely identify the request.

verification.desc: The details of KYC Verification of the account holder.

accountHolder.desc: The result(s) of the checks on the account holder.

checks.desc: A list of the checks and their statuses.

requiredFields.desc: A list of the fields required for execution of the check.

status.desc:
The status of the check.

Permitted Values: DATA_PROVIDED, PASSED, PENDING, AWAITING_DATA, RETRY_LIMIT_REACHED, INVALID_DATA, FAILED.

summary.desc: A summary of the execution of the check.

type.desc:
The type of check.

Permitted Values: COMPANY_VERIFICATION, IDENTITY_VERIFICATION, PASSPORT_VERIFICATION, BANK_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION, NONPROFIT_VERIFICATION.

bankAccounts.desc: The result(s) of the checks on the bank account(s).

bankAccountUUID.desc: The unique ID of the bank account to which the check applies.

checks.desc: A list of the checks and their statuses.

requiredFields.desc: A list of the fields required for execution of the check.

status.desc:
The status of the check.

Permitted Values: DATA_PROVIDED, PASSED, PENDING, AWAITING_DATA, RETRY_LIMIT_REACHED, INVALID_DATA, FAILED.

summary.desc: A summary of the execution of the check.

type.desc:
The type of check.

Permitted Values: COMPANY_VERIFICATION, IDENTITY_VERIFICATION, PASSPORT_VERIFICATION, BANK_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION, NONPROFIT_VERIFICATION.

shareholders.desc: The result(s) of the checks on the shareholder(s).

checks.desc: A list of the checks and their statuses.

requiredFields.desc: A list of the fields required for execution of the check.

status.desc:
The status of the check.

Permitted Values: DATA_PROVIDED, PASSED, PENDING, AWAITING_DATA, RETRY_LIMIT_REACHED, INVALID_DATA, FAILED.

summary.desc: A summary of the execution of the check.

type.desc:
The type of check.

Permitted Values: COMPANY_VERIFICATION, IDENTITY_VERIFICATION, PASSPORT_VERIFICATION, BANK_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION, NONPROFIT_VERIFICATION.

shareholderCode.desc: The code of the shareholder to which the check applies.

error.desc: Error information of failed request. No value provided here if no error occurred on processing.

errorCode.desc: The Adyen code that is mapped to the error message.

message.desc: A short explanation of the issue.

eventDate.desc: The date and time when an event has been completed.

eventType.desc: The event type of the notification.

executingUserKey.desc: The user or process that has triggered the notification.

live.desc: Indicates whether the notification originated from the live environment or the test environment. If true, the notification originated from the live environment. If false, the notification originated from the test environment.

pspReference.desc: The PSP reference of the request from which the notification originates.

notificationResponse.desc: Set this property to [accepted] to acknowledge that you received a notification from Adyen.
